subsection.name: Without pom.xml change
subsection.p:
To compile all coffeescripts in ${basedir}/src/main/coffeescript and put the result in ${project.build.outputDirectory}
$> mvn com.voltvoodoo.coffeescript-maven:compile

subsection.name: With pom.xml change
subsection.p:
To compile all coffeescripts in src/main/coffee and put the result in target/classes
<project> ... <build> <plugins> ... <plugin> <groupId>com.voltvoodoo</groupId> <artifactId>coffeescript-maven</artifactId> <executions> <execution> <goals> <goal>compile</goal> </goals> </execution> </executions> <configuration> <sourceDir>src/main/coffee</sourceDir> <outputDir>target/classes</outputDir> </configuration> </plugin> ... </plugins> </build> ... </project>
